channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: 基础知识 chart: helm package repository: charts can be collected and shared release: is an instance of a chart running in a Kubernetes cluster. Helm installs charts into Kubernetes, creating a new release for each installation. And to find new charts, you can search Helm chart repositories. Command helm search helm search hub searches the Artifact Hub, which lists helm charts from dozens of different repositories. helm search repo searches the repositories that you have added to your local helm client (with helm repo add).
